mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_message( user, statu, title, text, time, deadline ) VALUES ( #{message.user}, #{message.statu}, #{message.title}, #{message.text}, #{message.time}, #{message.deadline} )
mapper.update: UPDATE t_message SET statu=#{status} WHERE mid = #{mid}
UPDATE t_message SET statu=1 WHERE user=#{username} AND statu = 0
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM t_message WHERE user = #{username}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM t_message WHERE user = #{username} and statu = 0

SELECT * FROM t_message WHERE user = #{username} and statu = 0 ORDER BY time DESC, mid DESC
LIMIT #{startIndex},10
